title: Heres an idea.
body:
If you feed X games in a row you get locked out of ranked for a week.

There we go matchmaking is fixed.

Yellow for president, now fuck off with your "just carry yourself out bullshit" unless you have some super secret op strat to carry 4 feeders at once then ill listen to you, but until you provide real solutions i want none of it.

replies.body: Then 99% of your eligible opponents will be locked out and you will be unable to find a game ;^)
nek minnut "Omg rito why are my ques so damn long, fix this shit".
You mean people arent doing that right now?

mang im not trying to be mean, but your constant complaint threads make it easy for people to seem mean.

i main morde and urgot the proverbial bottom of the barrel, played 45 games with 56% winrate and am b3 a few wins from b2. what are you doing wrong, maybe a change of attitude/strategy/playstyle might be good for you?

You hit the nail on the head with attitude.

As ive mentioned a few times the game gets easier for me the higher in elo i get, for multiple reasons.

My teams get less heavy.

i tilt less because there are less mistakes for me to get pissy about.

And i feel more challenged which makes me play more seriously.

Basically b5 is actually harder than b1 for me, and i can confirm that having been b1 many many times.

Isnt that what the game already is right now? He posts as he has a current wait time of 53 minutes and has been waiting for 4 hours at one point.

Tbh at this point id gladly take longer queue times to guarantee a smoother ranked experience.
Nek minnut "nahh that enemy adc wasn't feeding, he can stay. I was just way better than him"

This isnt for intent feeders, its feeders, tbh itd probably include me when im on a tilt streak.

You suck in ranked it locks you out of ranked for long enough for you to either not come back, or learn to not suck during your lockout.

How will the system work?

What happens to the support mains who usually go 2/16/32.
Would they be banned due to lack of kills?
Even if it did get released, this "idea" would have so many bugs that Riot would have to remove it.

0/10 shit post.

kda

Kills + assists / deaths.

problem solved next please.
